Description: Text in French says that there are toys and presents at the Lafayette Galeries during all of the month of December. Illustration shows a serviceman holding up two dolls to show two small children. The little boy is dressed in a service uniform costume holding a toy gun. The little girl has a Red Cross costume on.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Aux Galeries Lafayette
